lines.text: [the balloon is about to land in the middle of the jungle]
It's a forest full of trees!

[frisking Ahmed]
What have you got there?
British campaign medals. Professor, look at these. China, India... Where did you steal these from?
What? I don't steal! I am an *honest* slave trader. Oh, yes, little things, they come my way once in a while...
I was teaching at the Dodoma mission when he
Trafficking in human lives is everybody's concern. Either you are for it or against it.

[to Fergusson]
In Timbuktu it is much safer to be a villain than an infidel.
